name: A Door Between Seasons
description:
This game was developed for the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam

In the game, you play a 9-Year-old girl who needs to reach the end by solving 3 very simple puzzles using magical doors that allows her to teleport between Winter and Spring. As you play you'll find drawings to tell a little bit about the story of this girl and why she is here.

The game can be completed in about 5 minutes.

Controls

  • WASD - Move Around
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • Left Mouse Click - Interact/Throw
  • Esc - Exit Game

Game Credits

  • Game Developed by Alex Olinkiewicz
    • Game Developed in Unreal Engine 4, 3D Models done in Blender, Artwork/Textures done in Affinity Photo.
  • Audio Files obtained by these Assets
    • Footsteps Sounds with Blueprint Setup -by- Bartosz Kamol Kaminski
    • Horror Engine -by- Bartosz tansuergene
